data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Utrecht get the game underway.
In the minute 46, Rob Dieperink blows to start the second-half. Sittard with the kick-off.
Goal! A Mimoun Mahi header gives Utrecht a 1-0 lead in Utrecht.
Gyrano Kerk with an assist there.
In the minute 63, Sebastian Polter (Sittard) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
That's a fine assist from George Cox.
Utrecht make their first substitution with Adrian Dalmau replacing Moussa Sylla.
In the minute 68, Rene Hake is making the team's second substitution at Stadion Galgenwaard with Eljero Elia replacing Bart Ramselaar.
Jorrit Smeets is on a sub for Emil Hansson for Sittard.
Rene Hake (Utrecht) is making a third substitution, with Othman Boussaid replacing Joris Overeem.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Mark Van der Maarel with Giovanni Troupee.
Gyrano Kerk (Utrecht) has received a first yellow card.
Martin Angha (Sittard) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
That's full-time at Stadion Galgenwaard. The final score is 1-1.
Sebastian Polter is booked for the away team.
